item.description:
Offering Pitch card game opportunity first to funseekers and
then will post with another group if we need additional players.

Limiting this game to 4 players. Please check your RSVP status to avoid
no shows and allow those on the waiting list to attend.

Looking forward to a fun night of Pitch. This event may repeat based on
the first event and availability of card playing venue. This venue does not
allow smoking or alcohol.

Will email the venues location and my contact info when RSVP's close
Tue 3/19/2013.
item.name: Pitch (Hi, Low, Jack) Friday evening card game
